text: Paradise Road is a 1997 Australian American war movie directed by Bruce Beresford and was based on the diaries by Betty Jeffrey. It stars Pauline Collins, Glenn Close, Frances McDormand, Cate Blanchett, Jennifer Ehle, Wendy Hughes, Elizabeth Spriggs, Pamela Rabe, Aden Young. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Related pages== * Tenko ==Other websites== * * Category:1997 movies Category:1990s war movies Category:Australian movies Category:American war movies Category:Movies directed by Bruce Beresford Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Indonesia
title: Paradise Road (1997 movie)
